message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $13,000.  What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  This product holds substantial value, and I'm confident it can make a real difference for you. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can you consider that price?
